pages.text: And We passed the children of Israel safely across the sea. They came upon a people devoted to their idols, and said, "O Moses! Make for us a god as the gods they have." Said he, "Verily, you are ignorant people
Verily, these people- destroyed shall be their way, and vain is that which they are doing
He said, "Shall I seek for you a god other than Allah, when He has preferred you above all creatures
And (remember) when We saved you from PharaohÂ´s people who wrought you evil woe, slaying your sons, and sparing your women. In that was a mighty trial from your Lord

And We appointed for Moses thirty nights (of solitude), and added ten (more), and he completed the time appointed by his Lord for forty nights. And Moses said unto his brother Aaron, "Act for me amongst my people, and do what is right, and follow not
